wikipedia_page.main: Les Cartwright  (born March 4, 1952) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1974 and 1978, playing 7 matches. He played his first match on 11 May 1974 against England and his last match on 25 October 1978 against Malta.

response: *Les Cartwright - Former Association Footballer and Wales international, played for Coventry City and Wrexham AFC
